name: Snowman: Winter Puzzle
description:
Snowman: Winter Puzzle is a block-merging, free and addictive puzzle game, that brings joy and the Christmas spirit to all players.

Merge blocks to make a snowman in simple and addictive gameplay that will challenge you. Match three or more equal blocks to get a block of a higher rank. Move from snowflakes and snowballs to a snowman with a broom in this fun and atmospheric Christmas game.
Plus, playing more gives you additional Christmas attributes on the screen. Get them all!
Download now and discover exceptional atmosphere of Snowman: Winter Puzzle.

Snowman: Winter Puzzle features:

SIMPLE BLOCK-MERGING GAMEPLAY
Play anytime and anywhere. Just relax and make a snowman.

PLAY ALONGSIDE YOUR FRIENDS
See the best score of your friends in the Game Center.

ENJOY THE CHRISTMAS SPIRIT
More overall score opens the Christmas tree and other attributes on the screen.

THE HALL OF FAME
See your achievements in the hall of fame. Collect them all to become a truly fun.

No in-app purchases, no ads.
